name: Regatta Storage
headline: Transform S3 in an unlimited, local file system
description: Regatta transforms S3 buckets into a 30x faster, unlimited, local disk. Regatta enables AI, analytics, and serverless applications to instantly access massive data sets without waiting for data transfer. Researchers use Regatta for shareable, local storage of data set and model versions that never runs out of capacity.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:developer-tools; industry:big-data; industry:cloud-computing; industry:infrastructure; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Hunter Leath, Founder
founders.description: I'm building Regatta Storage, a cloud file system with unlimited capacity, local-like performance, and instant access to massive data sets in your S3 buckets. I've spent the past 9 years building cloud storage products at AWS and Netflix, and I'm thrilled that teams can finally stop managing disks.

# Cloud-scalestorageforAIapplications
> Regatta is infinitely scaleable cloud storage that is highly-performant for all your AI applications. With direct S3 bucket integration, Regatta enables instant access to massive datasets, eliminating transfer delays and accelerating time-to-insight.
> AI applications rely on Regatta to share data without the need to checkpoint or backup to S3. Regatta functions as a regular file system, fully compatible with your applications – no code changes needed.
[ Try it now ](https://regattastorage.com/<https:/console.regattastorage.com/api/signin>)
[ Schedule a Demo ](https://regattastorage.com/<https:/cal.com/team/regatta/demo>)
![](https://regattastorage.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Startup-Hero-BG-2.webp)
![](https://regattastorage.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Startup-Hero-BG-2.webp)
![](https://regattastorage.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/Integrations-2.png)
![](https://regattastorage.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/Zero-Cold-Start-1.png)
###### Features
## 30x faster than S3
Regatta makes existing data sets available to applications instantly, providing sub-millisecond access to data in S3 – a 30x speed improvement compared to using S3 directly. Improve application data transfer performance by eliminating data download and decompression time.
###### Features
## Unlimited local disk
Because it’s designed for today’s modern AI applications, Regatta scales infinitely for any application. Once you’ve turned on Regatta, you’ll never think about running out of disk space, scaling volumes, or sharding data again.
![](https://regattastorage.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/Unlimited-storage.png)
![](https://regattastorage.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/Carbon-code-3.png)
###### Features
## Your software, faster storage
Regatta transforms your S3 buckets into a cloud-based file system that’s structured  _exactly_ like files on your local disk. Use it with your existing Pandas, PyTorch, and Spark applications – no special libraries needed. Just mount Regatta, point your application to it, and see instant performance improvements.
###### Demo
## Regatta in Action
  * Features


## Share data without managing disks
Because Regatta abstracts your underlying storage, applications can share data sets from any compute environment without worrying about managing the underlying disks or data transfer.
![](https://regattastorage.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/10/data-sharing.png)
## Pricing
### Starter
See immediate performance improvements in your AI and analytics applications with simple, usage-based pricing.
## $0.05
/ gigabyte transferred
[ Try it now ](https://regattastorage.com/<https:/console.regattastorage.com/>)
  * $0.20/GiB-mo of high-speed cache
  * $25.00/mo for your first file system
  * $5.00/mo for each additional file system


### Enterprise
Customizable performance that scales to the size of your data sets.
## Custom
Contact Us
  * Volume discounting
  * 1-hour support SLA


###### Features
## Local storage that scales
Only pay for the data you use as you use it. Regatta automatically handles performance and capacity scaling so you don’t have to.
#### Pay as you go
Only pay for the data that you transfer and access frequently with Regatta - no provisioning required.
#### Durable
Regatta is designed to provide 5 9s of durability to newly written data before it's flushed to your S3 bucket.
#### Performant
Regatta provides fast, sub-millisecond latencies for file system operations.
#### POSIX compliant
With support for all file system features (including append, rename, and hard links), Regatta is compatible with all file-based applications
#### Avoid Vendor Lock-In
Data is always placed in your S3 bucket for long-term storage. If you decide to stop using Regatta, your data is still available with the S3 API.
#### S3 API Compatible
Regatta is compatible with most object storage systems which implement the S3 API (such as Cloudflare R2, Google Cloud Storage, Azure Blob Storage).
## Frequently asked questions
Other questions? Don’t hesitate to reach out.
Contact Us
#####  How does Regatta work? 
Regatta uses centralized, shared caching to stage data written by your application before propagating that data to your backing S3 object storage. Most changes on your Regatta file system appear on the S3 backing storage within 5 minutes of completion.
#####  What performance does Regatta offer? 
Regatta is designed to provide sub-millisecond latencies for most metadata, write, and reads of frequently-accessed data. Regatta supports up to 10 GiB/s of total throughput from all connected file system clients.
#####  How does Regatta compare to S3FS? 
S3FS, and other S3 file system views (including Goofys, S3A, and Mountpoint for Amazon S3) only support a small number of file operations, and many applications (such as logging, or model building) are not supported. Regatta supports all file functionality and is compatible with all POSIX file applications.
#####  How does Regatta compare to ObjectiveFS? 
ObjectiveFS is not designed to be used with existing S3 buckets, and isn’t optimized for use with multi-instance workloads. You can’t access data written using ObjectiveFS from the S3 API natively. Regatta uses centralized caching across all instances so that file system updates are available instantly to all clients, and is designed to work with the data that you’ve already stored in S3 object storage.
## Savings Calculator
Find out how much you can save by switching to Regatta.
## Stop thinking about disks
Get started today with Regatta, and you won’t have to think about data transfer or disk capacity again.
[ Try it Now ](https://regattastorage.com/<https:/console.regattastorage.com>)
![](https://regattastorage.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/regatta-text-light.png)
[ ![](https://regattastorage.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/08/Tan.png) ](https://regattastorage.com/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/companies/regatta-storage>)

generated_description:
**Regatta Storage: Transforming Data Access for AI and Beyond**

Founded in 2024 and part of Y Combinator Batch F24, Regatta Storage is a San Francisco-based startup that’s making waves in the cloud storage landscape. The mission is straightforward yet powerful—transform Amazon S3 storage into a local file system that is not only unlimited but also 30 times faster. This means no more waiting for data transfers, making it ideal for AI, analytics, and serverless applications.

**What Regatta Does**

At its core, Regatta Storage provides a seamless connection between your applications and substantial datasets in S3. This translates to instant access without the delays and performance issues commonly associated with cloud storage. Researchers and developers can effortlessly manage large data sets and version control without fear of running out of disk space.

**Key Features**

1. **Blazing Fast Performance**: Regatta offers sub-millisecond access speeds—30x faster than traditional S3 access. This dramatic increase in performance is a game changer, especially for applications that demand quick data retrieval.

2. **Infinite Scalability**: Forget about provisioning storage or dealing with sharding and volume management. With Regatta, your data storage can infinitely scale to meet the demands of your applications.

3. **POSIX Compliance**: It operates just like a regular file system, perfectly compatible with existing applications such as Pandas, PyTorch, and Spark, eliminating the need for code changes.

4. **Ease of Use**: Developers can mount Regatta and point their applications directly to it, enabling immediate performance enhancements without diving deep into configuration.

5. **Flexibility and Control**: Users only pay for what they use, and their data remains in their S3 bucket—a fail-safe against vendor lock-in.

**The Team and Support**

Regatta Storage is structured lean with a team of three and is guided by Group Partner Nicolas Dessaigne. This agility allows for rapid iteration and responsiveness to user needs.

**Pricing Structure**

Regatta employs a usage-based pricing model, starting at $0.05 per gigabyte transferred, making it accessible for startups and scalable for larger enterprises. There are additional costs for high-speed caching and supplementary file systems.

**Future Aspirations**

As they gear up for a rebranding to capture their expanding capabilities, the excitement around Regatta Storage is palpable. They aim to redefine what cloud-based data management can achieve, especially as AI continues to demand faster and more reliable data access.

For developers and researchers looking to harness the power of their data without the traditional overhead, Regatta Storage is certainly worth a look.

For more information, you can visit [Regatta Storage's official website](https://regattastorage.com).
